p:
We tested whether mycorrhizal status affected species‐specific responses to garlic mustard treatments. To do this, we used the Relative Interaction Index (RII; Armas et al. 2004), which calculates the biomass response to a biological interaction, here, the relative biomass difference with and without garlic mustard
RII =
